channel.title: [FIXED]Map Regions loading causes player's position to be off
channel.description: Fixed. Map Region packet changes offset of coordinates so I had to make the player teleport when the region changes in the Player updating.

item.title: [FIXED]Map Regions loading causes player's position to be off
item.dc:creator: @cedia cedia
item.description:
@cedia wrote:

You guys were both right. It was a minor problem in the player updating. I had to redo the player updating when i converted from 634 to 550 and I missed this small detail.

Map Region packet changes offset of coordinates so I had to make the player teleport when the region changes in the Player updating.

Thanks you two

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED]Map Regions loading causes player's position to be off

item.title: [FIXED]Map Regions loading causes player's position to be off
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yup, it’s the updating. Are you using the original scape-emulator or the Moparscape server current version? I fixed like 5-10 issues with the original updating if you are using the moparscape version, but I think there are still some issues. If you do find it I would appreciate you pointing it out

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED]Map Regions loading causes player's position to be off

item.title: [FIXED]Map Regions loading causes player's position to be off
item.dc:creator: @cedia cedia
item.description:
@cedia wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:545251”]Might be your updating.
Check your map region packet with one from another server to see if something is wrong.[/quote]

Yea the same thing happens on #550 protocol when I converted to it. The map region packet is fine.

I’ll see what I can find in the updating.

Read full topic
